name: Clone (Wes Does)
description:
I'm working on a clone of an old game as a way to teach myself more skills. This isn't something that's ever intended for a "real" release of any sort.

Controller:

  • Digipad to move
  • Triggers to attack, 
  • Start for Inventory
  • A to start the game
  • Back to Restart
  • Y to save

Keyboard:

  • Arrows to move
  • Space for Sword Attack
  • Control for Item
  • Shift for Inventory
  • Space to Start Game
